quote: I like the night. Without the dark, we'd never see the stars.
author: Stephenie Meyer,  Twilight

quote: Success in management requires learning as fast as the world is changing.
author: Warren Bennis

quote: One lives in the hope of becoming a memory.
author: Antonio Porchia

quote: If somebody is not on the same page with me humor wise, I can't give them that.
author: Stephan Pastis

quote: It's the game of life. Do I win or do I lose? One day they're gonna shut the game down. I gotta have as much fun and go around the board as many times as I can before it's my turn to leave.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: If you don't like it, learn to love it!
author: Ric Flair

quote: It is the spectator, and not life, that art really mirrors.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
author: Mark Caine

quote: There is hope in dreams, imagination, and in the courage of those who wish to make those dreams a reality.
author: Jonas Salk

quote: In sitcoms, the women are so beautiful, understanding and well-bred. They have humor, but sort of display it with a twinkle of the eye and not a guffaw. But there's no juice in that for me.
author: Bea Arthur

quote: Life is too short to not have fun; we are only here for a short time compared to the sun and the moon and all that.
author: Coolio

quote: I have never denied my background or my culture. I have taught my child to embrace her Mexican heritage, to love my first language, Spanish, to learn about Mexican history, music, folk art, food, and even the Mexican candy I grew up with.
author: Salma Hayek

quote: It is the function of art to renew our perception. What we are familiar with we cease to see. The writer shakes up the familiar scene, and, as if by magic, we see a new meaning in it.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Women are meant to be loved, not to be understood.
author: Oscar Wilde,  Lord Arthur Savile's Crime and Other Stories

quote: You know the world is going crazy when the best rapper is a white guy, the best golfer is a black guy, the tallest guy in the NBA is Chinese, the Swiss hold the America's Cup, France is accusing the U.S. of arrogance, Germany doesn't want to go to war, and the three most powerful men in America are named "Bush", "Dick", and "Colin."Need I say more?
author: Chris Rock

quote: Finding good partners is the key to success in anything: in business, in marriage and, especially, in investing.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The capacity for hope is the most significant fact of life. It provides human beings with a sense of destination and the energy to get started.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: Athletes tend to have less of a sense of humor than most people. They are heroes to so many. That might be part of it.
author: Jeff Ross

quote: For the past 33 years, I have looked in the mirror every morning and asked myself: 'If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?' And whenever the answer has been 'No' for too many days in a row, I know I need to change something.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: God tells me that I need to provide for my family, discipline and teach my children, and love my wife as Christ loves the church. If I don't do that, I'm being unfaithful and sinful.
author: Kevin DeYoung

quote: In France, cooking is a serious art form and a national sport.
author: Julia Child

quote: Never memorize something that you can look up.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Fellowship of the Ring

quote: Make treating yourself a priority and always remember your life is happening now. Don't put off all your dreams and pleasures to another day. In any balanced personal definition of success there has to be a powerful element of living life in the present.
author: Mireille Guiliano

quote: Extreme hopes are born from extreme misery.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: It's odd how violence and humor so often go together, isn't it?
author: Dan Simmons

quote: Life is full of beauty. Notice it. Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces. Smell the rain, and feel the wind. Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.
author: Ashley Smith

quote: I still believe that love is the most powerful force in the world, even though I am yet to experience it fully.
author: Rufus Wainwright

quote: I believe the target of anything in life should be to do it so well that it becomes an art.
author: Arsene Wenger

quote: We all die. The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Diary

quote: Success on any major scale requires you to accept responsibility... in the final analysis, the one quality that all successful people have... is the ability to take on responsibility.
author: Michael Korda

quote: A whole stack of memories never equal one little hope.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: With reporting, if you work hard, you can usually pull something out. But writing humor doesn't respond to working hard, necessarily. I mean, you could just sit there and look at the page all day and maybe something will come.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: We cannot stop the winter or the summer from coming. We cannot stop the spring or the fall or make them other than they are. They are gifts from the universe that we cannot refuse. But we can choose what we will contribute to life when each arrives.
author: Gary Zukav

quote: The love of liberty and the sense of human dignity are the basic elements of the Anarchist creed.
author: Federica Montseny

quote: I would be willing to do almost anything to make Art happy. I care about our friendship. The only thing I won't do is change the essence of my work.
author: Paul Simon

quote: Hold fast to dreams,For if dreams dieLife is a broken-winged bird,That cannot fly.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: We fell in love, despite our differences, and once we did, something rare and beautiful was created. For me, love like that has only happened once, and that's why every minute we spent together has been seared in my memory. I'll never forget a single moment of it.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook

quote: The only thing I have learnt over the years is that if you enjoy your work and put in the best efforts, it will show. If you follow this process, things work out. But if you go chasing a formula, success will elude you.
author: Mahesh Babu

quote: He that lives upon hope will die fasting.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I really love middle-grade. Middle-grade books have a little more of a magical, light-hearted feel. You can be a little bit more quirky, you can have a little more humor. It doesn't get so dark and deep.
author: James Dashner

quote: Love never reasons, but profusely gives; it gives like a thoughtless prodigal its all, and then trembles least it has done to little.
author: Hannah More

quote: Cleanliness is the scourge of art.
author: Craig Brown

quote: Is it true that you shouted at Professor Umbridge?""Yes.""You called her a liar?""Yes.""You told her He Who Must Not Be Named is back?""Yes.""Have a biscuit, Potter.
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: How lucky I am to have known somebody and something that saying goodbye to is so damned awful.
author: Evans G. Valens,  The Other Side of the Mountain: The Story of Jill Kinmont

quote: Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike.
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: Destroying things is much easier than making them.
author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The sudden disappointment of a hope leaves a scar which the ultimate fulfillment of that hope never entirely removes.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: Negative humor is forgotten immediately. It's the stuff that makes us feel better about our lives that lives long. Much more satisfying. Enter children's books.
author: Berkeley Breathed

quote: There is a plan and a purpose, a value to every life, no matter what its location, age, gender or disability.
author: Sharron Angle

quote: There has always been this narrator in me - I loved ideas, and part of the great love affair I would have with ideas consisted of talking about them.
author: Jason Silva

quote: They say Princes learn no art truly, but the art of horsemanship. The reason is, the brave beast is no flatterer. He will throw a prince as soon as his groom.
author: Ben Jonson

quote: Nothing succeeds like the appearance of success.
author: Christopher Lasch

quote: I always entertain great hopes.
author: Robert Frost

quote: My dad instilled in me a great sense of humor. I wasn't bullied at school because my outward attitude was confident, and that helps.
author: Warwick Davis

quote: Life is very interesting... in the end, some of your greatest pains, become your greatest strengths.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: The thing about Chicago is that it really isn't like any other place. The architecture and the layout of the city are the best. I'm from the Midwest, and consider myself a Midwesterner. I feel most at home there. I love California. I have great friends in California. I just have always considered Illinois to be home.
author: Vince Vaughn

quote: The artist must create a spark before he can make a fire and before art is born, the artist must be ready to be consumed by the fire of his own creation.
author: Auguste Rodin

quote: We should all start to live before we get too old. Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Enjoying success requires the ability to adapt. Only by being open to change will you have a true opportunity to get the most from your talent.
author: Nolan Ryan

quote: Hope is like peace. It is not a gift from God. It is a gift only we can give one another.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: I think that sense of humor is important in marriage. A sense of humor gets people through marriage.
author: Connie Britton

quote: For God so loved the World that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: There's got to be something you want to tell and that's the engine which spurs all of the work you have to do in order to create the story, but you have to love some sort of nugget of what you're telling to be a filmmaker.
author: Bradley Cooper

quote: I was an awful critic. I operated on the assumption that there was an absolute scale of values against which art could be measured. I didn't trust my own subjective responses.
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: When I look at my room, I see a girl who loves books.
author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quote: I, with a deeper instinct, choose a man who compels my strength, who makes enormous demands on me, who does not doubt my courage or my toughness, who does not believe me naïve or innocent, who has the courage to treat me like a woman.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: As my father used to tell me, the only true sign of success in life is being able to do for a living that which makes you happy.
author: Al Yankovic

quote: With optimism, you look upon the sunny side of things. People say, 'Studs, you're an optimist.' I never said I was an optimist. I have hope because what's the alternative to hope? Despair? If you have despair, you might as well put your head in the oven.
author: Studs Terkel

quote: The great thing about 'Weeds' is that everything we do is never quite serious enough to be taken seriously. It always has humor behind it, and it think it makes it definitely more fun for the audience.
author: Alexander Gould

quote: Loving oneself isn't hard, when you understand who and what 'yourself' is. It has nothing to do with the shape of your face, the size of your eyes, the length of your hair or the quality of your clothes. It's so beyond all of those things and it's what gives life to everything about you. Your own self is such a treasure.
author: Phylicia Rashad

quote: I wanted to write a very simple story about a boy, a wolf, a girl, a bear and a forest, so I thought I might set it in the past. I didn't realise that it went back to when I was 10: I used to love the Stone Age when I was a kid and wanted to live in it, and I got rid of my bed and slept on the floor, but I didn't remember it.
author: Michelle Paver

quote: Layer by layer art strips life bare.
author: Robert Musil

quote: For instance, on the planet Earth, man had always assumed that he was more intelligent than dolphins because he had achieved so much—the wheel, New York, wars and so on—whilst all the dolphins had ever done was muck about in the water having a good time. But conversely, the dolphins had always believed that they were far more intelligent than man—for precisely the same reasons.
author: Douglas Adams,  The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

quote: I think it's way harder when you have success, 'cause people tend to not treat you the same or look at you the same because they see the success or the money you make.
author: Meek Mill

quote: You all know that I have been sustained throughout my life by three saving graces - my family, my friends, and a faith in the power of resilience and hope. These graces have carried me through difficult times and they have brought more joy to the good times than I ever could have imagined.
author: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: The waltz is a very important part of my life. It's a very important way for me to express my positiveness, bringing humor to the world.
author: Andre Rieu

quote: Youth is not a time of life; it is a state of mind; it is not a matter of rosy cheeks, red lips and supple knees; it is a matter of the will, quality of the imagination, a vigor of the emotions; it is the freshness of the deep springs of life.
author: Samuel Ullman

quote: Real art is basic emotion. If a scene is handled with simplicity - and I don't mean simple - it'll be good, and the public will know it.
author: John Wayne

quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. And that's what you've given me. That's what I'd hoped to give you forever
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: Once upon a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering.
author: Nicole Krauss,  The History of Love

quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: But Hopes are Shy Birds flying at a great distance seldom reached by the best of Guns.
author: John James Audubon

quote: Every black film feels like it's Tyler Perry, and that just needs to stop. But people seem to slowly be looking for what else is out there - 'Is there something else besides this type of humor?' 'I'm tired of seeing men in dresses.'
author: Issa Rae

quote: The care of human life and happiness, and not their destruction, is the first and only object of good government.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: There's design, and there's art. Good design is total harmony. There's no better designer than nature - if you look at a branch or a leaf, it's perfect. It's all function. Art is different. It's about emotion. It's about suffering and beauty - but mostly suffering!
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: Lord save us all from old age and broken health and a hope tree that has lost the faculty of putting out blossoms.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Be fun! I don't like homes or rooms that don't have a sense of humor or have some sense of whimsy or a personality. Your home should reflect who you are, and what you love. I would never have something in my home because it's the thing to have. I have to love it and it needs some connection to me.
author: Bryan Batt

quote: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but I love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, and when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.
author: Joyce Giraud

quote: I love pointy nails! A cute way to add a pop of color to your nails is to make a V-shape at the ends of them in a pastel color.
author: Bella Thorne

quote: Performance has to be mainstream art. This is what I'm fighting for.
author: Marina Abramovic

quote: Going to church doesn’t make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile.
author: Billy Sunday,  Billy Sunday, the Man and His Message: With His Own Words Which Have Won Thousands for Christ

quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art.... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things which give value to survival.
author: C.S. Lewis,  The Four Loves

quote: A good friend will always stab you in the front.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Fear can be good when you're walking past an alley at night or when you need to check the locks on your doors before you go to bed, but it's not good when you have a goal and you're fearful of obstacles. We often get trapped by our fears, but anyone who has had success has failed before.
author: Queen Latifah

quote: God grant me the courage not to give up what I think is right even though I think it is hopeless.
author: Chester W. Nimitz

quote: People in Russia adapt to misery by a deep, deep humor.
author: Ian Frazier

quote: I always say that the times in my life when I've been happiest are the times when I've seen, like, a sunset.
author: Chris Evans

quote: Love is the delightful interval between meeting a beautiful girl and discovering that she looks like a haddock.
author: John Barrymore

quote: I feel like skateboarding is as much of a sport as a lifestyle, and an art form, so there's so much that that transcends in terms of music, fashion, and entertainment.
author: Tony Hawk

quote: If the world were merely seductive, that would be easy. If it were merely challenging, that would be no problem. But I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day.
author: E.B. White

quote: I have an idea of who I want to be, I have a vision of my own success.
author: Wiz Khalifa

quote: All kids need is a little help, a little hope and somebody who believes in them.
author: Magic Johnson

quote: Bands from Akron have a sense of humor and don't tend to take themselves too seriously.
author: Dan Auerbach

quote: When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life; now that I am old I know that it is.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: To be happy with a man you must understand him a lot and love him a little. To be happy with a woman you must love her a lot and not try to understand her at all.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: In visual perception a color is almost never seen as it really is - as it physically is. This fact makes color the most relative medium in art.
author: Josef Albers

quote: I would always rather be happy than dignified.
author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre

quote: Some of the best lessons we ever learn are learned from past mistakes. The error of the past is the wisdom and success of the future.
author: Dale Turner

quote: The theological virtue of hope is the patient and trustful willingness to live without closure, without resolution, and still be content and even happy because our Satisfaction is now at another level, and our Source is beyond ourselves.
author: Richard Rohr

quote: If you look at the game and everything, it's not quite like looking at an animated film, because that's total character. This, this is really movement, but it's got funny little things if you look for the humor. They're actually getting to the character.
author: Don Bluth

quote: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness. It is far better take things as they come along with patience and equanimity.
author: Carl Jung

quote: I'd rather be a failure at something I love than a success at something I hate.
author: George Burns

quote: Our best teachers do more than impart facts and figures - they inspire and encourage students and instill a true desire to learn. That's a fine art in itself.
author: Sonny Perdue

quote: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Tomorrow hopes we have learned something from yesterday.
author: John Wayne

quote: I often have said that to be a college president, you need a thick skin, a good sense of humor, and nerves like sewer pipes.
author: Gordon Gee

quote: Science is a way of life. Science is a perspective. Science is the process that takes us from confusion to understanding in a manner that's precise, predictive and reliable - a transformation, for those lucky enough to experience it, that is empowering and emotional.
author: Brian Greene

quote: There are many little ways to enlarge your child's world. Love of books is the best of all.
author: Jackie Kennedy

quote: Making art is not the matter of a moment, and nor is making an exhibition; curating follows art.
author: Hans-Ulrich Obrist

quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a harder battle.
author: Plato

quote: Success means having the courage, the determination, and the will to become the person you believe you were meant to be.
author: George A. Sheehan

quote: Hope is a waking dream.
author: Aristotle

quote: I love 'Dexter.' The dark sense of humor is wonderful.
author: Stephen J. Cannell

quote: You are educated. Your certification is in your degree. You may think of it as the ticket to the good life. Let me ask you to think of an alternative. Think of it as your ticket to change the world.
author: Tom Brokaw

quote: He who loves with purity considers not the gift of the lover, but the love of the giver.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: I used to stay up all night playing 'Resident Evil 2,' and it wouldn't stop until the sun came up. Then I'd walk outside at dawn's first light, looking at the empty streets of London, and it was like life imitating art. It felt like I'd stepped into an actual zombie apocalypse.
author: Edgar Wright

quote: Deep in the meadow, hidden far awayA cloak of leaves, a moonbeam rayForget your woes and let your troubles layAnd when it's morning again, they'll wash awayHere it's safe, here it's warmHere the daisies guard you from every harmHere your dreams are sweet and tomorrow brings them trueHere is the place where I love you.
author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quote: Our daily decisions and habits have a huge impact upon both our levels of happiness and success.
author: Shawn Achor

quote: In the end, that's what this election is about. Do we participate in a politics of cynicism or a politics of hope?
author: Barack Obama

quote: I can't live without a sense of humor. I need to be laughing and entertained at all times.
author: Carlos Ponce

quote: Make it a habit to tell people thank you. To express your appreciation, sincerely and without the expectation of anything in return. Truly appreciate those around you, and you'll soon find many others around you. Truly appreciate life, and you'll find that you have more of it.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: There is no love that is not an echo.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: For art to exist, for any sort of aesthetic activity to exist, a certain physiological precondition is indispensable: intoxication.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I've never fooled anyone. I've let people fool themselves. They didn't bother to find out who and what I was. Instead they would invent a character for me. I wouldn't argue with them. They were obviously loving somebody I wasn't.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Humor has bailed me out of more tight situations than I can think of. If you go with your instincts and keep your humor, creativity follows. With luck, success comes, too.
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something tomorrow.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: There was a time I was very much blaming the way I felt on L.A, that it was a vacuum of creativity, of humor or anything organic, and I was really angry at the place. But then today I feel completely different - I love L.A.!
author: Naomi Watts

quote: I remember my mother's prayers and they have always followed me. They have clung to me all my life.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone; it has to be made, like bread, remade all the time, made new.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: Admiration for a quality or an art can be so strong that it deters us from striving to possess it.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Anyone who wants to sell you overnight success or wealth is not interested in your success; they are interested in your money.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Be prepared, work hard, and hope for a little luck. Recognize that the harder you work and the better prepared you are, the more luck you might have.
author: Ed Bradley

quote: I'm a Larry David fan, right? And it seems to me that Jewish history from the Talmud on has been a self-deprecating, self-critical kind of humor.
author: Peter Eisenman

quote: The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in.
author: Paris Hilton

quote: I'm not really easy to live with! There needs to be unlimited patience and unconditional love. Men I've known before loved my independent spirit and were proud of my success, to the point that they'd become jealous of the time I devote to my career.
author: Milla Jovovich

quote: Yes, the Bible should be taught in our schools because it is necessary to understand the Bible if we are to truly understand our own culture and how it came to be. The Bible has influenced every part of western culture from our art, music, and history, to our sense of fairness, charity, and business.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I don't want to go to heaven. None of my friends are there.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Talent alone won't make you a success. Neither will being in the right place at the right time, unless you are ready. The most important question is: 'Are your ready?'
author: Johnny Carson

quote: Hopeful thinking can get you out of your fear zone and into your appreciation zone.
author: Martha Beck

quote: There's a hysterical, tired sense of humor that comes after working 14 hours a day, six days a week. I like those things because they take the pressure off the constant stress.
author: Tom Berenger

quote: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: When I really love someone, I can only show it by making aggressive and bad-taste remarks.
author: Slavoj Zizek

quote: The great art of life is sensation, to feel that we exist, even in pain.
author: Lord Byron

quote: A friend of mine said something powerful at his grandfather's funeral. He said that the greatest lesson from his grandfather's life was that he died empty, because he accomplished everything he wanted, with no regrets. I think that, along with leaving a legacy, would be the greatest sign of success.
author: Marvin Sapp

quote: There can be hope only for a society which acts as one big family, not as many separate ones.
author: Anwar Sadat

quote: I think God has a sense of humor, and the way my lessons come from God is very funny. I have to laugh at myself even if it's a tough lesson.
author: Yvette Nicole Brown

quote: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: I've always wanted to be a mom because I want to give a kid all of the magical gifts my mom gave to me, such as love and friendship. She and I had this incredible connection that was so unbelievable.
author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quote: All things are artificial, for nature is the art of God.
author: Thomas Browne

quote: Facts do not cease to exist because they are ignored.
author: Aldous Huxley,  Complete Essays 2, 1926-29

quote: I hope she'll be a fool -- that's the best thing a girl can be in this world, a beautiful little fool.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  The Great Gatsby

quote: Success to me is being a good person, treating people well.
author: David LaChapelle

quote: One loves to possess arms, though they hope never to have occasion for them.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: I don't think humor is forced upon my universe; it's a part of it.
author: Manuel Puig

quote: My biggest success is getting over the things that have tried to destroy and take me out of this life. Those are my biggest successes. It has nothing to do with work.
author: Tyler Perry

quote: Pasta isn't just for Italian food anymore. Now there are tasty pasta recipes found in Asian cuisine, and it's emerging as a newfound love for vegans.
author: Marcus Samuelsson

quote: We live in an age when the traditional great subjects - the human form, the landscape, even newer traditions such as abstract expressionism - are daily devalued by commercial art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Some women choose to follow men, and some women choose to follow their dreams. If you're wondering which way to go, remember that your career will never wake up and tell you that it doesn't love you anymore.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: Reader, suppose you were an idiot. And suppose you were a member of Congress. But I repeat myself.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.
author: Ben Sweetland

quote: On the first day of school, you got to be real careful where you sit. You walk into the classroom and just plunk your stuff down on any old desk, and the next thing you know the teacher is saying, 'I hope you all like where you're sitting, because these are your permanent seats.'
author: Jeff Kinney

quote: I don't feel that I'm strictly Danish; I don't feel that my sense of humor is strictly Danish or my human sensibility is strictly Danish.
author: Susanne Bier

quote: I would argue that nothing gives life more purpose than the realization that every moment of consciousness is a precious and fragile gift.
author: Steven Pinker

quote: Beauty, sweet love, is like the morning dew, Whose short refresh upon tender green, Cheers for a time, but till the sun doth show And straight is gone, as it had never been.
author: Samuel Daniel

quote: Feelings aroused by the touch of someone's hand, the sound of music, the smell of a flower, a beautiful sunset, a work of art, love, laughter, hope and faith - all work on both the unconscious and the conscious aspects of the self, and they have physiological consequences as well.
author: Bernie Siegel

quote: Fathers and mothers have lost the idea that the highest aspiration they might have for their children is for them to be wise... specialized competence and success are all that they can imagine.
author: Allan Bloom

quote: Behaving morally because of a hope of reward or a fear of punishment is not morality. Morality is not bribery or threats. Religion is bribery and threats. Humans have morality. We don't need religion.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: I love puns. I've been known to turn the car around just to take advantage of a good pun situation. It really is the highest form of humor.
author: Karin Slaughter

quote: The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life, and the promise of future accomplishments.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: History has remembered the kings and warriors, because they destroyed; art has remembered the people, because they created.
author: William Morris

quote: There are no good girls gone wrong - just bad girls found out.
author: Mae West

quote: Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Success is just being happy. And I try so many different things. I do a lot of different things. Because I think God has helped me to love myself. I know who God is, and I love God.
author: Herschel Walker

quote: The youth is the hope of our future.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: People who know me know I have a sense of humor that can really push the envelope.
author: Carmen Electra

quote: Don't listen to what anybody says except the people who encourage you. If it's what you want to do and it's within yourself, then keep going and try to do it for the rest of your life.
author: Jake Gyllenhaal

quote: Part of growing up is realizing you learn to love so many people. It's about forming those relationships and finding what will last forever.
author: Dylan O'Brien

quote: Politics is the art of the possible.
author: Otto von Bismarck

quote: I might be in love with you."He smiles a little. "I'm waiting until I'm sure to tell you, though.
author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent

quote: The optimist underestimates how difficult it is to achieve real change, believing that anything is possible and it's possible now. Only by confronting head-on the reality that all progress is going to be obstructed by vested interests and corrupted by human venality can we create realistic programmes that actually have a chance of success.
author: Julian Baggini

quote: Any people anywhere, being inclined and having the power, have the right to rise up, and shake off the existing government, and form a new one that suits them better. This is a most valuable - a most sacred right - a right, which we hope and believe, is to liberate the world.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I love the vulgar. I kind of have the humor of a 17-year-old boy.
author: Judy Gold

quote: I know that many of you do wear such a cross of Christ, not in any ostentatious way, not in a way that might harm you at your work or recreation, but a simple indication that you value the role of Jesus Christ in the history of the world, that you are trying to live by Christ's standards in your own daily life.
author: Keith O'Brien

quote: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theatre.
author: Andy Serkis

quote: Football is an art, like dancing is an art - but only when it's well done does it become an art.
author: Arsene Wenger

quote: It means 'Shadowhunters: Looking Better in Black Than the Widows of our Enemies Since 1234'.
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones

quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
author: Albert Camus

quote: It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Fight Club

quote: When a small child, I thought that success spelled happiness. I was wrong, happiness is like a butterfly which appears and delights us for one brief moment, but soon flits away.
author: Anna Pavlova

quote: We must restore hope to young people, help the old, be open to the future, spread love. Be poor among the poor. We need to include the excluded and preach peace.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Every time I do a movie like 'Finding Neverland' or 'Chocolat' or 'Shakespeare' in Love,' we deal with the creative process, but there's humor and fun along the way. I always love that kind of movie.
author: Harvey Weinstein

quote: I've learned in most areas of my life, to bounce heated choices off other people. Co-workers, my agent, my wife, a sponsor, etc. A majority of the time, that keeps me on the right side of things.
author: Kurt Sutter

quote: I seriously feel like the best days are ahead, and I like the idea of getting to do everything I did before but with more knowledge, experience, and street smarts. There's a certain love, appreciation, and gratitude that you have at 40 that you don't have when you're younger, and it makes every accomplishment feel so much better.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: Ballet is an incredibly difficult, beautiful art form that takes a lot of training, a lot of time, and a lot of hard work.
author: Sutton Foster

quote: You're a prefect? Oh Ronnie! That's everyone in the family!""What are Fred and I? Next door neighbors?
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: Over the years, I've become barraged by comments from people, such as, 'Beam me up, Scotty!' and I became defensive. I felt they were derisive and engendered an attitude. I am grateful for the success, but didn't want to be mocked.
author: William Shatner

quote: Philip Larkin has a tough honesty and sense of humor that I find irresistible, as a contemporary poet.
author: Robert Morgan

quote: You need to make a commitment, and once you make it, then life will give you some answers.
author: Les Brown

quote: What does love look like? It has the hands to help others. It has the feet to hasten to the poor and needy. It has eyes to see misery and want. It has the ears to hear the sighs and sorrows of men. That is what love looks like.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: You wouldn't have the same art on the walls at every restaurant or the same waiter uniforms. Neither should you have the same service style at every restaurant.
author: Danny Meyer

quote: The ever quickening advances of science made possible by the success of the Human Genome Project will also soon let us see the essences of mental disease. Only after we understand them at the genetic level can we rationally seek out appropriate therapies for such illnesses as schizophrenia and bipolar disease.
author: James D. Watson

quote: I hope we shall crush in its birth the aristocracy of our monied corporations which dare already to challenge our government to a trial by strength, and bid defiance to the laws of our country.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Do feminists have a sense of humor? Yes.
author: Gloria Allred

quote: I tell myself that God gave my children many gifts - spirit, beauty, intelligence, the capacity to make friends and to inspire respect. There was only one gift he held back - length of life.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: Money is not a motivating factor. Money doesn't thrill me or make me play better because there are benefits to being wealthy. I'm just happy with a ball at my feet. My motivation comes from playing the game I love. If I wasn't paid to be a professional footballer I would willingly play for nothing.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: Part of what I do and what I want to do is I want to bring art into the everyday life. If you can take ordinary just walking in the street and you're confronted by something, that might change your day - it might inspire you.
author: Kenny Scharf

quote: Substitute 'damn' every time you're inclined to write 'very;' your editor will delete it and the writing will be just as it should be.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way.
author: Vera Wang

quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: 'The Sundial' is written with the kind of humor that would make a guillotine laugh.
author: Victor LaValle

quote: I was living an extremely burdensome life, because every time I prayed, I became more clearly aware of my faults. On the one hand, God was calling me. On the other, I was following the way of the world. Doing what God wanted made me happy; but I felt bound by the things of this world.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Art is like baby shoes. When you coat them with gold, they can no longer be worn.
author: John Updike

quote: And I'm suppose to sit by while you date boys and fall in love with someone else, get married...?"His voice tightened. "And meanwhile, I'll die a little bit more every day, watching.
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Glass

quote: We can all agree that government can't solve the obesity crisis alone. It's an ongoing issue that will require a collaborative effort across private and public sectors if we want to see some long-term success.
author: Marcus Samuelsson

quote: What greater aspiration and challenge are there for a mother than the hope of raising a great son or daughter?
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: I like dark humor. My favorite movie of all time is 'Harold and Maude.'
author: Leslie Mann

quote: Life finds its purpose and fulfillment in the expansion of happiness.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: I love to go to the zoo. But not on Sunday. I don't like to see the people making fun of the animals, when it should be the other way around.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Reason clears and plants the wilderness of the imagination to harvest the wheat of art.
author: Austin O'Malley

quote: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: And so the lion fell in love with the lamb…"he murmured. I looked away, hiding my eyes as I thrilled to the word."What a stupid lamb,"I sighed."What a sick, masochistic lion.
author: Stephenie Meyer,  Twilight

quote: Look, if you ask a child, 'Would you rather have a fulfilled mother or a stay-at-home Sylvia Plath,' they'll pick Sylvia Plath every time. But I think it's really important that children don't feel their parents' emotional lives depend on their success.
author: Ayelet Waldman

quote: I only hope that we don't lose sight of one thing - that it was all started by a mouse.
author: Walt Disney

quote: I try to cope with everything through humor.
author: Gail Porter

quote: My whole life is about winning. I don't lose often. I almost never lose.
author: Donald Trump

quote: A dream is what makes people love life even when it is painful.
author: Theodore Zeldin

quote: Architecture is basically the design of interiors, the art of organizing interior space.
author: Philip Johnson

quote: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot,Nothing is going to get better. It's not.
author: Dr. Seuss,  The Lorax

quote: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The worst part of success is, to me, adapting to it. It's scary.
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: The human body experiences a powerful gravitational pull in the direction of hope. That is why the patient's hopes are the physician's secret weapon. They are the hidden ingredients in any prescription.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: I can't not find humor in elements of most parts of life, but at the same time nothing ever seems perpetually funny to me.
author: Greg Kinnear

quote: Everyone suffers some injustice in life, and what better motivation than to help others not suffer in the same way.
author: Bella Thorne

quote: No art is less spontaneous than mine. What I do is the result of reflection and the study of the great masters.
author: Edgar Degas

quote: Some books should be tasted, some devoured, but only a few should be chewed and digested thoroughly.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: One of the key elements of human behavior is, humans have a greater fear of loss than enjoyment of success. All the academic studies will show you that the fear of loss of capital is far greater than the enjoyment of gains.
author: Laurence D. Fink

quote: We all hope for breakthrough rebirth moments.
author: Dane Cook

quote: Humor can inform and break down stigma, which is a huge issue in the military.
author: Garry Trudeau

quote: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are travelling the dark journey with us. Oh be swift to love, make haste to be kind.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: My motivation for being a good drummer was born out of fear, which, in a way, seems so antithetical to what art should be.
author: Damien Chazelle

quote: Let every man feel that he is the architect and builder of his own life, and that he proposes to make a success of it by working.
author: Heber J. Grant

quote: If the skies fall, one may hope to catch larks.
author: Francois Rabelais

quote: Brits have a better sense of humor in most ways. It's darker, more cutting.
author: Stephan Pastis

quote: I'll tell you, in my life I've never once have seen a Hispanic panhandler, because in our community, it would be viewed as shameful to be out on the street begging. Those are all conservative values - faith, family, hard work, responsibility.
author: Ted Cruz

quote: I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: I think we're much smarter than we were. Everybody knows that abstract art can be art, and most people know that they may not like it, even if they understand there's another purpose to it.
author: Roy Lichtenstein

quote: All the world is made of faith, and trust, and pixie dust.
author: J.M. Barrie,  Peter Pan

quote: This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love

quote: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Hope, like faith, is nothing if it is not courageous; it is nothing if it is not ridiculous.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: Humor reminds you, when you're flattened by sorrow, that you're still human.
author: Elizabeth McCracken

quote: The world has never yet seen a truly great and virtuous nation because in the degradation of woman the very fountains of life are poisoned at their source.
author: Lucretia Mott

quote: It is necessary to fall in love... if only to provide an alibi for all the random despair you are going to feel anyway.
author: Albert Camus

quote: In life, as in art, the beautiful moves in curves.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
author: Stephen King,  Different Seasons

quote: You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts.
author: Kahlil Gibran,  The Prophet

quote: It's really a wonder that I haven't dropped all my ideals, because they seem so absurd and impossible to carry out. Yet I keep them, because in spite of everything, I still believe that people are really good at heart.
author: Anne Frank,  The Diary of a Young Girl

quote: Success is almost totally dependent upon drive and persistence. The extra energy required to make another effort or try another approach is the secret of winning.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Hope, deceiving as it is, serves at least to lead us to the end of our lives by an agreeable route.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: You write the way you think about the world. My motto in times of trouble - and I'm speaking of life, not writing - is 'no humor too black.'
author: Elizabeth McCracken

quote: Loud is a way of life.
author: Steven Adler

quote: Love cannot endure indifference. It needs to be wanted. Like a lamp, it needs to be fed out of the oil of another's heart, or its flame burns low.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Does art have a future? Performance genres like opera, theater, music and dance are thriving all over the world, but the visual arts have been in slow decline for nearly 40 years. No major figure of profound influence has emerged in painting or sculpture since the waning of Pop Art and the birth of Minimalism in the early 1970s.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: I heard what you said. I’m not the silly romantic you think. I don’t want the heavens or the shooting stars. I don’t want gemstones or gold. I have those things already. I want…a steady hand. A kind soul. I want to fall asleep, and wake, knowing my heart is safe. I want to love, and be loved.
author: Shana Abe

quote: May you live every day of your life.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: The secret of success is learning how to use pain and pleasure instead of having pain and pleasure use you. If you do that, you're in control of your life. If you don't, life controls you.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Hope is itself a species of happiness, and, perhaps, the chief happiness, which this world affords.
author: William Samuel Johnson

quote: I have the humor of a 9-year-old boy, and sometimes I've had laughing fits on-air.
author: Megyn Kelly

quote: No matter how you're feeling, a little dog gunna love you.
author: Waka Flocka Flame

quote: Art saved me; it got me through my depression and self-loathing, back to a place of innocence.
author: Jeanette Winterson

author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones

quote: It is sometimes an appropriate response to reality to go insane.
author: Philip K. Dick,  VALIS

quote: Honesty and loyalty are key. If two people can be honest with each other about everything, that's probably the biggest key to success.
author: Taylor Lautner

quote: We hope that through these trade arrangements, through collaboration in training, in manpower development, and what have you, ASEAN in, say, ten years' time, will be a very different ASEAN.
author: Sellapan Ramanathan

quote: I think the thrust of any child is to try to fit in and be part of it. And I can't tell you how many times my humor, you know, what I thought was humor ended up making me the outsider. author: Howie Mandel

quote: A shady business never yields a sunny life.
author: B. C. Forbes

quote: It's tangible, it's solid, it's beautiful. It's artistic, from my standpoint, and I just love real estate.
author: Donald Trump

quote: Movies become art after editing. Instead of just reproducing reality, they juxtapose images of it. That implies expression; that's art.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: Reading is one form of escape. Running for your life is another.
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: Here’s to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy.
author: Charlaine Harris

quote: Some people care too much. I think it's called love.
author: A.A. Milne,  Winnie-the-Pooh

quote: Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world.
author: Bette Midler

quote: I have had extremely good relations with the United States and with both parties (Republicans and Democrats), and I hope to continue to have these good relations, which I, again repeating, do not consider to be mutually exclusive with having good relations with Venezuela or Ecuador or whichever country in South America.
author: Juan Manuel Santos

quote: The biggest void that people can have in their lives is a sense of humor. Spending your life with someone who doesn't have that wouldn't be palatable.
author: Howie Mandel

quote: The Hercules' was a monumental undertaking. It is the largest aircraft ever built... I put the sweat of my life into this thing.
author: Howard Hughes

quote: My thoughts on gay marriage are that everyone has the right to love and be loved, and that's the position I take.
author: Nick Jonas

quote: During the Middle Ages they understood that words accompanied by imagery are much more memorable. By making the margins of a book colorful and beautiful, illuminations help make the text unforgettable. It's unfortunate that we've lost the art of illumination.
author: Joshua Foer

quote: I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal.
author: Jane Austen,  Jane Austen's Letters

quote: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
author: Bobby Unser

quote: I certainly notice the vitality in Belfast, which wasn't there in the Seventies. There was a war going on then. Now there are cranes everywhere. There really is a sense of renewal and hope.
author: Liam Neeson

quote: My family has been amazing, and they understand how blessed I am. They've been able to keep my sense of humor.
author: Karen Duffy

quote: Every major question in history is a religious question. It has more effect in molding life than nationalism or a common language.
author: Hilaire Belloc

quote: Even from their infancy we frame them to the sports of love: their instruction, behavior, attire, grace, learning and all their words azimuth only at love, respects only affection. Their nurses and their keepers imprint no other thing in them.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Nature is inside art as its content, not outside as its model.
author: Marilyn French

quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I'd be happy to live till 80 as long as I was comfortable and in good health. Mind you, ask me again on the eve of my 80th birthday. Even so, I hope we don't all start living to be 120. I'm not sure I'd cope with another 60 years.
author: Bonnie Tyler

quote: Sure, I am funny and have a good sense of humor. Mostly, though, I just tell the truth. The internal dialogue people have in their heads - I just write it.
author: Kara Swisher

quote: It is my aim, my destination in life to make the cello as beloved an instrument as the violin and piano.
author: Mstislav Rostropovich

quote: I love dressing up. It's the best part of being a girl, I think.
author: Emma Roberts

quote: Even in literature and art, no man who bothers about originality will ever be original: whereas if you simply try to tell the truth (without caring twopence how often it has been told before) you will, nine times out of ten, become original without ever having noticed it.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be.
author: May Sarton

quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: The planet's hope and salvation lies in the adoption of revolutionary new knowledge being revealed at the frontiers of science.
author: Bruce Lipton

quote: People see me laughing and telling jokes, but they had no idea after the show was over, I had no joy in my life, in my heart.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: I have seen many storms in my life. Most storms have caught me by surprise, so I had to learn very quickly to look further and understand that I am not capable of controlling the weather, to exercise the art of patience and to respect the fury of nature.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes.
author: A.A. Milne,  Winnie-the-Pooh

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: I hope that at the end of the seven years, people will say that I have been of some inspirational value to them at home in terms of inclusiveness and abroad, I look forward to representing Ireland.
author: Michael D. Higgins

quote: Good acting is thinking in front of the camera. I just do that and apply a sense of humor to it. You have to trust the audience to get it.
author: Charles Grodin

quote: So many tangles in life are ultimately hopeless that we have no appropriate sword other than laughter.
author: Gordon W. Allport

quote: To say nothing, especially when speaking, is half the art of diplomacy.
author: Will Durant

quote: Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
author: C.G. Jung

quote: I attribute my success to this - I never gave or took any excuse.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: Candidate Obama was either exceptionally naive or willfully disingenuous when he vowed to change the way Washington works. The very promise of Hope and Change was rooted in uprooting the Washington modus operandi. But instead of rejecting it, he embraced it all - the secrecy, the closed doors, the political favors, the near-criminal negligence.
author: Reince Priebus

quote: I like doing comedy, I like doing drama. Naturally I like to do, I like doing dramas, I like conflict, and when I do a comedy, you know, I've found that, like, romantic comedy is the trickiest one, because often it's neither: it's not romantic and it's not funny. So, like, I like a comedy that's biting. It's biting humor or really quirky humor.
author: Matt Dillon

quote: Whether you are an astronomer or a life scientist, geophysicist, or a pilot, you've got to be there because you believe you are good in your field, and you can contribute, not because you are going to get a lot of fame or whatever when you get back.
author: Alan Shepard

quote: I love everything that's old, - old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wine.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Love isn't an emotion or an instinct - it's an art.
author: Mae West

quote: Anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Success doesn't necessarily come from breakthrough innovation but from flawless execution. A great strategy alone won't win a game or a battle; the win comes from basic blocking and tackling.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: When it comes down to it, it's giving people a good night out in a basic way and I think my company guarantees that. There's always something new and something to excite us and surprise us, and that's why people come back, I hope.
author: Matthew Bourne

quote: My dad was a very funny man - he's the one who taught me life would be awfully hard without humor! I'm sure his Irish wit in some way influenced my decision to become an actress.
author: Joan Cusack

quote: There are certain things about me that I will never tell to anyone because I am a very private person. But basically, what you see is who I am. I'm independent, I do like to be liked, I do look for the good side of life and people. I'm positive, I'm disciplined, I like my life in order, and I'm neat as a pin.
author: Mary Tyler Moore

quote: Every happening, great and small, is a parable whereby God speaks to us, and the art of life is to get the message.
author: Malcolm Muggeridge

quote: You educate a man; you educate a man. You educate a woman; you educate a generation.
author: Brigham Young

quote: True success is overcoming the fear of being unsuccessful.
author: Paul Sweeney

quote: The only way of knowing a person is to love them without hope.
author: Walter Benjamin

quote: Most of the people in my family were pretty funny. Everyone had a good sense of humor. I came to California right after college, wanting to be a musician.
author: Andy Kindler

quote: Many people come to reinvention when life changes around them, but people come in all different stripes. I'm oriented to change.
author: Jane Pauley

quote: Bad food is made without pride, by cooks who have no pride, and no love. Bad food is made by chefs who are indifferent, or who are trying to be everything to everybody, who are trying to please everyone... Bad food is fake food... food that shows fear and lack of confidence in people's ability to discern or to make decisions about their lives.
author: Anthony Bourdain

quote: It is not up to me whether I win or lose. Ultimately, this might not be my day. And it is that philosophy towards sports, something that I really truly live by. I am emotional. I want to win. I am hungry. I am a competitor. I have that fire. But deep down, I truly enjoy the art of competing so much more than the result.
author: Apolo Ohno

quote: I don't believe in the transformation myth, where if you have more success, life changes for you.
author: Ben Mendelsohn

quote: When a man becomes a Christian, he becomes industrious, trustworthy and prosperous. Now, if that man, when he gets all he can and saves all he can, does not give all he can, I have more hope for Judas Iscariot than for that man!
author: John Wesley

quote: Using no control and using humor will build a relationship and make a dent to where the client puts the counselor in their quality world and then begins to relate and seek out the counselor. Effective therapy begins with the acceptance of the therapist into the client's quality world.
author: William Glasser

quote: How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving and tolerant of the weak and strong. Because someday in your life you will have been all of these.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: He who does not love his own language is worse than an animal and smelly fish.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: Politics is the art of choosing between the disastrous and the unpalatable.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: A guy and a girl can be just friends, but at one point or another, they will fall for each other...Maybe temporarily, maybe at the wrong time, maybe too late, or maybe forever
author: Dave Matthews Band

quote: Never laugh at live dragons.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: You've got to eat while you dream. You've got to deliver on short-range commitments, while you develop a long-range strategy and vision and implement it. The success of doing both. Walking and chewing gum if you will. Getting it done in the short-range, and delivering a long-range plan, and executing on that.
author: Jack Welch

quote: So many people grew up with challenges, as I did. There weren't always happy things happening to me or around me. But when you look at the core of goodness within yourself - at the optimism and hope - you realize it comes from the environment you grew up in.
author: Sonia Sotomayor

quote: Throughout history, great leaders have known the power of humor.
author: Allen Klein

quote: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
author: Jackie Robinson

quote: Art is a marriage of the conscious and the unconscious.
author: Jean Cocteau

quote: You know, all that really matters is that the people you love are happy and healthy. Everything else is just sprinkles on the sundae.
author: Paul Walker

quote: I hope that in this year to come, you make mistakes. Because if you are making mistakes...you're Doing Something.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: If you create incredible value and information for others that can change their lives - and you always stay focused on that service - the financial success will follow.
author: Brendon Burchard

quote: I do protect human rights, and I hope I shall always be looked up as a champion of human rights.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: It is characteristic of all deep human problems that they are not to be approached without some humor and some bewilderment.
author: Freeman Dyson

quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Actually I think Art lies in both directions - the broad strokes, big picture but on the other hand the minute examination of the apparently mundane. Seeing the whole world in a grain of sand, that kind of thing.
author: Peter Hammill

quote: Whatever you want to do, if you want to be great at it, you have to love it and be able to make sacrifices for it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Don’t go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I believe in everything until it's disproved. So I believe in fairies, the myths, dragons. It all exists, even if it's in your mind. Who's to say that dreams and nightmares aren't as real as the here and now?
author: John Lennon

quote: The secret of our success is that we never, never give up.
author: Wilma Mankiller

quote: That's all a man can hope for during his lifetime - to set an example - and when he is dead, to be an inspiration for history.
author: William McKinley

quote: It has always surprised me how little attention philosophers have paid to humor, since it is a more significant process of mind than reason. Reason can only sort out perceptions, but the humor process is involved in changing them.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Knowledge is love and light and vision.
author: Helen Keller

quote: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet.
author: Plato

quote: We write to taste life twice, in the moment and in retrospect.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: Success or failure in business is caused more by the mental attitude even than by mental capacities.
author: Walter Scott

quote: You accept that this civilisation could be abolished and life will begin later on after a few thousand years because that is something that has happened in the history of this planet. When you have peace in yourself and accept, then you are calm enough to do something, but if you are carried by despair there is no hope.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: In prehistoric times, mankind often had only two choices in crisis situations: fight or flee. In modern times, humor offers us a third alternative; fight, flee - or laugh.
author: Robert Orben

quote: You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
author: Walter Hagen

quote: The art of acceptance is the art of making someone who has just done you a small favor wish that he might have done you a greater one.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Love is what we were born with. Fear is what we learned here.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: I like work: it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours.
author: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: These woods are lovely, dark and deep,But I have promises to keep,And miles to go before I sleep,And miles to go before I sleep.
author: Robert Frost,  Stopping by Woods on a Snowy Evening

quote: Eating and reading are two pleasures that combine admirably.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life - all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Art is the most beautiful deception of all. And although people try to incorporate the everyday events of life in it, we must hope that it will remain a deception lest it become a utilitarian thing, sad as a factory.
author: Claude Debussy

quote: I don't need someone with a hot body. He can be fat or overweight and have a belly. It's very much about style and substance and humor, interest, curiosity and really being smart.
author: Kate Walsh

quote: Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
author: Bob Marley

quote: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
author: Albert Ellis

quote: You're imperfect, and you're wired for struggle, but you are worthy of love and belonging.
author: Brene Brown

quote: I think you still love me, but we can’t escape the fact that I’m not enough for you. I knew this was going to happen. So I’m not blaming you for falling in love with another woman. I’m not angry, either. I should be, but I’m not. I just feel pain. A lot of pain. I thought I could imagine how much this would hurt, but I was wrong.
author: Haruki Murakami,  South of the Border, West of the Sun

quote: The fault, dear Brutus, is not in our stars, but in ourselves.
author: William Shakespeare,  Julius Caesar

quote: While formal schooling is an important advantage, it is not a guarantee of success nor is its absence a fatal handicap.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: To withdraw is not to run away, and to stay is no wise action, when there's more reason to fear than to hope.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Poor David Hume is dying fast, but with more real cheerfulness and good humor and with more real resignation to the necessary course of things, than any whining Christian ever dyed with pretended resignation to the will of God.
author: Adam Smith

quote: Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
author: Mark Van Doren

quote: It is really rare to find someone you really, really love and that you want to spend your life with and all that stuff that goes along with being married. I am one of those lucky people. And I think she feels that way too. So the romantic stuff is easy because you want them to be happy.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: To this day, just always treat people the way you want to be treated. Whether it's family or friends or co-workers, I think it's the most important thing. Whether you have success or don't have it, whether you're a good person is all that matters.
author: Brenda Song

quote: God's way of answering the Christian's prayer for more patience, experience, hope and love often is to put him into the furnace of affliction.
author: Richard Cecil

quote: The comic is the perception of the opposite; humor is the feeling of it.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: History develops, art stands still.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: Thank you for reminding Canada that I'm a disappointment to them. I like hockey, I love it, but I'm not an avid hockey - let's face it, true Canadian - fan. I've always been more into snowboarding and skateboarding and sort of the alternative sports, I'm not crazy about hockey - but love it!
author: Dustin Milligan

quote: That's always seemed so ridiculous to me, that people want to be around someone because they're pretty. It's like picking your breakfeast cereals based on color instead of taste.
author: John Green,  Paper Towns

quote: Success is nothing if you don't have the right people to share it with; you're just gonna end up lonely.
author: Selena Gomez

quote: I hope I never get so old I get religious.
author: Ingmar Bergman

quote: The schizophrenic has no sense of humor. His world is a constantly daunting, unfriendly place.
author: Bob Newhart

quote: Maybe that's what life is... a wink of the eye and winking stars.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: Words may be false and full of art; Sighs are the natural language of the heart.
author: Thomas Shadwell

quote: What light is to the eyes - what air is to the lungs - what love is to the heart, liberty is to the soul of man.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: You wanna know what scares people? Success. When you don't make moves and when you don't climb up the ladder, everybody loves you because you're not competition.
author: Nicki Minaj

quote: Between the fear that something would happen and the hope that still it wouldn't, there is much more space than one thinks. On that narrow, hard, bare and dark space a lot of us spend their lives.
author: Ivo Andric

quote: As an actor, I'm attracted to drama; as a director, it's humor - because it's the story of my life, and I can't be that serious about it. Being alone is a big theme in all my movies, both as a director and as an actress.
author: Jodie Foster

quote: The most satisfying thing in life is to have been able to give a large part of one's self to others.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Jazz music is America's past and its potential, summed up and sanctified and accessible to anybody who learns to listen to, feel, and understand it. The music can connect us to our earlier selves and to our better selves-to-come. It can remind us of where we fit on the time line of human achievement, an ultimate value of art.
author: Wynton Marsalis

quote: When people get married because they think it's a long-time love affair, they'll be divorced very soon, because all love affairs end in disappointment. But marriage is a recognition of a spiritual identity.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Sleep is good, he said, and books are better.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: Like success, failure is many things to many people. With Positive Mental Attitude, failure is a learning experience, a rung on the ladder, a plateau at which to get your thoughts in order and prepare to try again.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: When we create hope and opportunity in the lives of others, we allow love, decency and promise to triumph over cowardice and hate.
author: Kirsten Gillibrand

quote: The combination of landing the biggest interview of my career and having a drill in my back reminds me that God only gives us what we can handle and that it helps to have a good sense of humor when we run smack into the absurdity of life.
author: Robin Roberts

quote: The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: No art is any good unless you can feel how it's put together. By and large it's the eye, the hand and if it's any good, you feel the body. Most of the best stuff seems to be a complete gesture, the totality of the artist's body; you can really lean on it.
author: Frank Stella

quote: Why, when we know that there's no such thing as perfect, do most of us spend an incredible amount of time and energy trying to be everything to everyone? Is it that we really admire perfection? No - the truth is that we are actually drawn to people who are real and down-to-earth. We love authenticity and we know that life is messy and imperfect.
author: Brene Brown

quote: The more I know of the world, the more I am convinced that I shall never see a man whom I can really love. I require so much!
author: Jane Austen,  Sense and Sensibility

quote: Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: The art of effective listening is essential to clear communication, and clear communication is necessary to management success.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: When Nelson Mandela walked free, the world sang with joy. Ever since, South Africa has stood as a beacon of hope for Africa.
author: Ban Ki-moon

quote: When I teach the formal curriculum, I have the chance to think about it ahead of time. I can rehearse it. I can illustrate it with self-deprecating humor and humble-sounding personal disclosure. I can try to make it comes out just right.
author: John Ortberg

quote: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see.
author: Edgar Degas

quote: In my life I've learned that true happiness comes from giving. Helping others along the way makes you evaluate who you are. I think that love is what we're all searching for. I haven't come across anyone who didn't become a better person through love.
author: Marla Gibbs

quote: There is never just one thing that leads to success for anyone. I feel it always a combination of passion, dedication, hard work, and being in the right place at the right time.
author: Lauren Conrad

quote: Corporations, consumers, and citizens must begin acting in concert to create a powerful third pillar of social transformation if we hope to meet the social challenges we currently face with equal force. This begins with corporations that choose to alter how they practice capitalism in two ways to serve the greater good.
author: Simon Mainwaring

quote: Denzel Washington has a great sense of humor. He did all those 'Nutty Professor' movies.
author: Seth MacFarlane

quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: What I dream of is an art of balance, of purity and serenity devoid of troubling or depressing subject matter - a soothing, calming influence on the mind, rather like a good armchair which provides relaxation from physical fatigue.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: I can still love an ex as a person, regardless if the breakup was bad. I would never wish anything negative on them. It takes more energy to hate them than to wish them well.
author: Ashley Greene

quote: She was a girl who knew how to be happy even when she was sad. And that’s important—you know
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: The will to persevere is often the difference between failure and success.
author: David Sarnoff

quote: In acting, there's a type of courage you're recognized for all the time. You lose 100 pounds and play a guy with AIDS, and you get rewarded. But, in life, doing what is courageous is quiet, and no one knows about it. Courage is someone making sacrifices for their family or making selfless decisions for what they hope or feel.
author: Rob Lowe

quote: I just am a snob when it comes to humor.
author: Courteney Cox

quote: We need to give each other the space to grow, to be ourselves, to exercise our diversity. We need to give each other space so that we may both give and receive such beautiful things as ideas, openness, dignity, joy, healing, and inclusion.
author: Max de Pree

quote: Art has the power to transform, to illuminate, to educate, inspire and motivate.
author: Harvey Fierstein

quote: The more one does and sees and feels, the more one is able to do, and the more genuine may be one's appreciation of fundamental things like home, and love, and understanding companionship.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Doubt thou the stars are fire;Doubt that the sun doth move;Doubt truth to be a liar;But never doubt I love.
author: William Shakespeare,  Hamlet

quote: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
author: Edgar Allan Poe,  Eleonora

quote: I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
author: Henry David Thoreau,  Walden: Or, Life in the Woods

quote: You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up.
author: Pat Conroy,  The Prince of Tides

quote: Never mind what others do; do better than yourself, beat your own record from day to day, and you are a success.
author: William J. H. Boetcker

quote: I hope people remember me for the kind of person that I am, not because of what I do.
author: Sean Faris

quote: Professional comedians, surprisingly, have a lack of humor. They're insensitive to the insanity of our times.
author: Mort Sahl
