quote: Here is the tragedy: when you are the victim of depression, not only do you feel utterly helpless and abandoned by the world, you also know that very few people can understand, or even begin to believe, that life can be this painful. There is nothing I can think of that is quite as isolating as this.
author: Giles Andreae

quote: The modern work of art, as I have said, is a symbol.
author: Herbert Read

quote: Love looks through a telescope; envy, through a microscope.
author: Josh Billings

quote: He who controls the past controls the future. He who controls the present controls the past.
author: George Orwell,  1984

quote: Being crazy isn't enough.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Love and esteem are the first principles of friendship; it is always imperfect if either of these two are wanting.
author: Eustace Budgell

quote: Success is attaining your dream while helping others to benefit from that dream materializing.
author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quote: I love Madrid. I am happy to be here. I have been here three years and hope to be here longer. But I am proud of where I come from and never forget the people I grew up with.
author: Zinedine Zidane

quote: Humor has become so cliche and boring that nothing's funny anymore unless it involves something totally disgusting that offends somebody or makes them feel really uncomfortable.
author: Tom DeLonge

quote: The resistance that you fight physically in the gym and the resistance that you fight in life can only build a strong character.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Art will never be able to exist without nature.
author: Pierre Bonnard

quote: We love because it's the only true adventure.
author: Nikki Giovanni

quote: Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, it's a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: The best time to frame an answer to the letters of a friend, is the moment you receive them. Then the warmth of friendship, and the intelligence received, most forcibly cooperate.
author: William Shenstone

quote: I don't want to be married to someone who feels inferior to my success or because I make more money than he does.
author: Grace Kelly

quote: But maybe music was not intended to satisfy the curious definiteness of man. Maybe it is better to hope that music may always be transcendental language in the most extravagant sense.
author: Charles Ives

quote: Ontologically, chocolate raises profoundly disturbing questions: Does not chocolate offer natural revelation of the goodness of the Creator just as chilies disclose a divine sense of humor? Is the human born with an innate longing for chocolate? Does the notion of chocolate preclude the concept of free will?
author: David Augsburger

quote: Animation is not the art of drawings that move but the art of movements that are drawn.
author: Norman McLaren

quote: Love will draw an elephant through a key-hole.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: To douchebags!"he said, gesturing to Brad. "And to girls that break your heart,"he bowed his head to me. His eyes lost focus. "And to the absolute fucking horror of losing your best friend because you were stupid enough to fall in love with her.
author: Jamie McGuire,  Beautiful Disaster

quote: You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I have lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.' You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt,  You Learn by Living: Eleven Keys for a More Fulfilling Life

quote: Very different from eros is philia, a serene love much more akin to friendship, with its reciprocal kindnesses. You love each other for the happy experiences and pleasures you share.
author: Francois Lelord

quote: Success comes from taking the initiative and following up... persisting... eloquently expressing the depth of your love. What simple action could you take today to produce a new momentum toward success in your life?

quote: Your life has to consist of more than 'Black people should unite.' You hope they do, but not twenty-four hours a day.
author: Gil Scott-Heron

quote: I love the Swedish people for their detective novels, their archipelago, their sense of humor, their carbonated vodka, and most especially, for their wonderful hospitality.
author: Michael Levitt

quote: Your life will be no better than the plans you make and the action you take. You are the architect and builder of your own life, fortune, destiny.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: I enjoy going out by myself... always have, always will. I don't have security guards, and, for the most part, I enjoy meeting new people. I see myself as a regular guy who likes playing video games with his nieces and nephews and poker with his family. I don't have an art collection or take exotic vacations. I enjoy being at home.

quote: Self-love is the source of all our other loves.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it.
author: Lloyd Alexander

quote: There are a lot of musicians I've met on Twitter where it was like, 'Hey, I like your music' - and then I ended up meeting them and it turned into a friendship.
author: Grimes

quote: If I wasn't even famous or had any success, I would still wake up and put tons of make-up on, and put on a cool outfit. That's always been who I've been my whole life, so that's never gonna change. I love fashion. I love getting dressed up. I love Halloween, too.

quote: You can't make people change, but the organizers of WorldFest hope that people consider being vegetarian for both moral and health reasons.
author: Grace Slick

quote: Sometimes the only way to deal with horrific things in life is through a dark sense of humor.
author: Margaret Cho

quote: I realize that humor isn't for everyone. It's only for people who want to have fun, enjoy life, and feel alive.
author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quote: Architecture is a visual art, and the buildings speak for themselves.
author: Julia Morgan

quote: Love is love's reward.
author: John Dryden

quote: They love their hair because they're not smart enough to love something more interesting.
author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quote: It is impossible to preserve my friendship with people who are allegedly leaders when they are attacking their own people, shooting at them, using tanks and other forms of heavy weaponry.
author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan

quote: I don't think ethical people deal with intimidation as a method to achieve success. Undermining someone's self-esteem isn't a method to achieve success.
author: Dominique Moceanu

quote: I was the guy who was friends with everybody. Yes, I had my core group of friends, but I wasn't part of a clique that excluded people. I hope they thought I was a nice guy. I tried to be just friendly and outgoing. I was class president. I'm supposed to run my class reunion in 2013.
author: Austin Stowell

quote: Confidence and a good sense of humor can usually win a chick over.
author: Danny McBride

quote: Wherever you are, be there totally. If you find your here and now intolerable and it makes you unhappy, you have three options: remove yourself from the situation, change it, or accept it totally. quote: I refuse to confide and don't like it when people write about art.
author: Balthus

quote: Love has a tide!
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: Laughter is timeless. Imagination has no age. And dreams are forever.
author: Walt Disney Company

quote: He never went out without a book under his arm, and he often came back with two.
author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables

quote: Experience is merely the name men gave to their mistakes.
author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win.
author: Stephen King

quote: what matters most is how well you walk through the fire
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: I'm friends with Taylor Swift, and I am tired of people asking me questions about our friendship. When I post a picture of us on Instagram, I'm posting a picture of me and my friend.
author: Sarah Hyland

quote: There are people who can achieve huge success in life, while adding a bit of fun and a splash of colour to this increasingly grey world.
author: Peter James

quote: I would say just start writing. You've got to write every day. Copy someone that you like if you think that perhaps could become your sound, too. quote: I've known my best friend since I was a baby, and I don't know what I would do without her. She is always straight with me and can make me laugh hysterically. Everyone should have someone like that in their life.
author: Jasmine Guinness

quote: I just really love being in my pajamas.
author: Rachel Bilson

quote: You never have to change anything you got up in the middle of the night to write.
author: Saul Bellow

quote: And by the way, everything in life is writable about if you have the outgoing guts to do it, and the imagination to improvise. The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: When I was working on my first novel, 'The Quilter's Apprentice,' I knew I wanted to write about friendship, especially women's friendship and how women use friendship to sustain themselves and nurture each other.
author: Jennifer Chiaverini

quote: Personality is the most important thing to an actress's success.
author: Mae West

quote: My message to you all is of hope, courage and confidence. Let us mobilize all our resources in a systematic and organized way and tackle the grave issues that confront us with grim determination and discipline worthy of a great nation.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: Although Kurt Vonnegut may not be considered a humor writer, 'Breakfast of Champions' is one of the funniest books I've ever read.
author: Justin Halpern

quote: Festivals are fun for kids, fun for parents and offer a welcome break from the stresses of the nuclear family. The sheer quantities of people make life easier: loads of adults for the adults to talk to and loads of kids for the kids to play with.
author: Tom Hodgkinson

author: Don King

quote: If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: I don't mind living in a man's world, as long as I can be a woman in it.
author: Marilyn Monroe,  Marilyn

quote: Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim.

author: Jimmy Carl Black

quote: The success I have achieved in bodybuilding, motion pictures, and business would not have been possible without the generosity of the American people and the freedom here to pursue your dreams.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Everybody's got a different sense of humor. It's just different styles.
author: Colin Quinn

quote: True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.
author: Socrates

quote: The art of leadership is saying no, not saying yes. It is very easy to say yes.
author: Tony Blair

quote: People's love of sweets and guilty feelings about overindulgence are pretty universal.

quote: Life is a disease: sexually transmitted, and invariably fatal.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana.

quote: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.

quote: Success is more difficult to handle than failure.
author: Ravi Zacharias

quote: When you can do the common things of life in an uncommon way, you will command the attention of the world.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: Only in art will the lion lie down with the lamb, and the rose grow without thorn.
author: Martin Amis

quote: I love the smell of juice boxes in the morning.
author: Robert Duvall

quote: Many people, myself among them, feel better at the mere sight of a book.

quote: Don't ever tell anybody anything. If you do, you start missing everybody.

quote: Kiss me, and you will see how important I am.
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never.

quote: The more defects a man may have, the older he is, the less lovable, the more resounding his success.

quote: I love the line of Flaubert about observing things very intensely. I think our duty as writers begins not with our own feelings, but with the powers of observing.
author: Mary Oliver

author: Douglas Coupland,  Shampoo Planet

quote: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.

author: Martin Seligman

author: Ed McMahon

author: Regina Brett

author: Henry Ward Beecher

author: Orson Welles

quote: Life is a book and there are a thousand pages I have not yet read.
author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Princess

quote: My daddy said, that the first time you fall in love, it changes you forever and no matter how hard you try, that feeling just never goes away.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook

quote: Think before you speak. Read before you think.
author: Fran Lebowitz,  The Fran Lebowitz Reader

quote: One look at an email can rob you of 15 minutes of focus. One call on your cell phone, one tweet, one instant message can destroy your schedule, forcing you to move meetings, or blow off really important things, like love, and friendship.
author: Jacqueline Leo

quote: People seldom see the halting and painful steps by which the most insignificant success is achieved.
author: Anne Sullivan

quote: I hope I can compete in one or two Olympics in my career. Of course I would like to win a medal, but just being there would be awesome.

quote: I think bands, when they're on the road, they keep their sanity by developing an internal sense of humor.

quote: I think what is interesting in life is all the cracks and all the flaws and all the moments that are not perfect.

author: Patti Stanger

quote: Why fit in when you were born to stand out?
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: The nicest thing for me is sleep, then at least I can dream.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Women attribute their success to working hard, luck, and help from other people. Men will attribute that - whatever success they have, that same success - to their own core skills.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Rock Hudson wasn't my type. He's a great guy and had a great sense of humor.

quote: Not to sound bad, but some girls are dumb. It's because they spend so much of their life trying to have the right look. On the other hand, some girls are just really smart. author: Wale

quote: Be true to yourself. Make each day a masterpiece. Help others. Drink deeply from good books. Make friendship a fine art. Build a shelter against a rainy day.
author: John Wooden

quote: I love to be comfortable, but I also love to play up the glamour.
author: Jessica Simpson

quote: I have great faith in fools - self-confidence my friends will call it.
author: Edgar Allan Poe,  Marginalia

quote: There are worse crimes than burning books. One of them is not reading them.
author: Joseph Brodsky

quote: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina

quote: …because nerds like us are allowed to be unironically enthusiastic about stuff… Nerds are allowed to love stuff, like jump-up-and-down-in-the-chair-can’t-control-yourself love it. author: John Green

quote: In a time of deceit telling the truth is a revolutionary act.
author: George Orwell

quote: The strong bond of friendship is not always a balanced equation; friendship is not always about giving and taking in equal shares. Instead, friendship is grounded in a feeling that you know exactly who will be there for you when you need something, no matter what or when.

quote: Believe it or not, I have about the same success rate as anyone else. Sometimes you hit, sometimes you miss.
author: Seth MacFarlane

quote: Few things in the world are more powerful than a positive push. A smile. A world of optimism and hope. A 'you can do it' when things are tough.
author: Richard M. DeVos

quote: I hate to say it but I hate black humor. I feel like a Klan member saying it, but it's just not funny.
author: Issa Rae

quote: What the mass media offers is not popular art, but entertainment which is intended to be consumed like food, forgotten, and replaced by a new dish.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: Do you know what it's like to love and be alone?
author: Abraham Polonsky

quote: Life is pain, highness. Anyone who says differently is selling something.
author: William Goldman,  William Goldman: Four Screenplays

quote: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: I was gratified to be able to answer promptly, and I did. I said I didn’t know.
author: Mark Twain

quote: But luxury has never appealed to me, I like simple things, books, being alone, or with somebody who understands.
author: Daphne du Maurier
